TopicTitle: Icon in VAB Expanding Endlessly When Mouseover

Articles.Content:
Hi!

I was wondering if anyone could help me with this, maybe I'm overlooking something simple.

I've made hundreds of parts in the past, but this particular one, a simple fuel tank is giving me all kinds of problems.

Basically when I roll over its icon in the VAB, the icon grows rapidly.

I can't see anything obvious in the config or Unity set-up, but I must be missing something.

Anyone else have this?

See:

this should fix it

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-23-modulefixer-v1/

So this is tied to having three resources in the tank?

Thanks for the fix!
